Text: Fwd Recommendationpst I look forward to seeing you next Thursday Kind regards Larry ContentTransferEncoding bit Returnpath From Fullname LawrenceLawyer MessageID Date Mon Jan EST Subject Recommendation To MIMEVersion ContentType textplain charsetUSASCII XMailer AOL for Windows US sub Vince Happy New Year Would you mind if I used you as a recommender for a job I am currently chasing at Cisco Systems Inc I have been talking to them about an Assistant Treasurer job The opportunity came through an executive search firm Heidrick Struggles and they would like to visit with some people in regard to my background deal skills origination skills and integrity Thank you very much I hope all is well and I look forward to catching up soon Kind regards Larry
Re FollowupThanks I have not If you would forward their phone numbers and address I will followup today Thanks again so much and talk to you soon Regards Larry
Re FollowupMark Would you remind me of your location at work again Thanks Talk to you soon Larry

Re FollowupMark Thanks very much for the information I left a message Friday for Clifford I arrive into Denver around am I have lunch planned with Bierbach at and a meeting with a headhunter at pm If I cant hook up with Clifford I will come by in the afternoon I look forward to seeing you and your family Talk to you soon Kind regards Larry

FollowupMark Thanks so much for your kind hospitality Please thank Alicia again for me How did Laurens play go last night I am getting more excited about a move away from Houston especially to Denver I hope you and your family have a great trip and please do give us a call if you swing into Houston Talk to you soon Kind regards Larry
